author: Associated Press
title: At Least 7 People Are Killed After Severe Storms Ravage Parts of the South
description: Severe weather blew through the South on Thursday after killing at least seven people in Oklahoma, Texas and Louisiana.
content: (MADILL, Okla.) — Severe weather blew through the South on Thursday after killing at least seven people in Oklahoma, Texas and Louisiana, including a worker at a factory hit by an apparent tornado, a man whose car was blown off the road and a man who went out… [+4502 chars]
